desc: LAToken ([url removed, login to view]) – a global blockchain platform for tokenization and trading of real assets via cryptocurrencies. We are #1 blockchain tokenization project by contributions with ~$20m raised from 11,000+ community members via Token Sale.Our team brings top-notch hedge funds and consultancy expertise (McKinsey, BCG) as well as entrepreneurship and community development experience to enhance capital markets with the blockchain technology and ease access to capital.We are looking for a passionate achiever for the Regional Manager position who will drive our PR & marketing activities, and potentially, be in charge of community management on the Korean market. Our goal for Korean market is to increase our presence in the local community to generate leads and clients for our core products, build trust within the community and engage more users to join us to bridge crypto and real economy.Key tasks:- Strategic and operational media planning, and arranging publications in local media including content quality control (i.e. translation quality, delivery of key messages)- Social Media Marketing: ads and posts in Korean crypto/finance/general blogs (i.e. café.naver, [url removed, login to view])- Content localization: translation of articles, website, documentation, banner ads, etc.- Setting up local meet-ups and conferences (crypto, blockchain, asset tokenization)- Continuous PR & marketing function improvement (i.e. search for new / most efficient channels, scripts refinement, etc.)- Opportunity to work from anywhere (i.e. Korea) and part-timeKey requirements:- You are ready to work in fast-moving environment while maintaining the quality of what you do- You are a team player who can also work independently and has a strong focus on getting things done- You are passionate about making impact and prioritizing your efforts (80/20)- Experience in Blockchain/ICO projects marketing/PR is preferable- Experience in PR/Marketing and connections with local FinTech media are preferable- Experience in event management is preferable, but not obligatory- Native Korean speakerBenefits:- Rapid growth of crypto/blockchain expertise in one of the world’s top crypto markets by trading volumes- Opportunity to join the top-notch international team spearheading blockchain implementation in the capital markets- Exposure to world-class products disrupting multi-trillion financial markets- Opportunity to work from anywhere (i.e. Korea) and part-time- Salary of $1,000-2,000 + fair share of bonuses based on candidate’s experience as well as meeting KPIs and achieving agreed milestones (including token opportunities)
title: Regional manager (Korean market) for LAToken blockchain platform – full/part-time
